Method new()

Initialize the SamplerKD object.

Usage

SamplerKD$new(
  param_set,
  task,
  minimize,
  alpha = 0.15,
  min_points_in_model = 0,
  bandwidth_factor = 3,
  min_bandwidth = 0.001
)

Arguments

param_set

(ParamSet)
ParamSet to sample from.

task

([TaskRegr][mlr3::TaskRegr)
Regression Task representing past performance values.

minimize

(logical)
Whether outcome in task is to be minimized.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

SamplerKD$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
